overview: Three decades after his second burial, Hungarian executed prime minister, Imre Nagy, is out of the grave again. In his wanderings through the streets of Budapest, Imre gets trapped. Hopelessly, he tries to find a way out; to die again. What is dead, will die again. Over and over. A city symphony with horses, pistols and a cowboy; a western film. A duel between "the image" and "the visual", inspired by Friedrich Schiller's "Das Lied von der Glocke".
title: Song of the Bell
